SELECT B.BOARD_NO, B.BOARD_TITLE, B.BOARD_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(B.BOARD_WRITE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS BOARD_WRITE_DATE, TO_CHAR(B.BOARD_EDIT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS BOARD_EDIT_DATE, B.BOARD_READ_COUNT, B.BOARD_STATUS, B.BOARD_STATUS_DATE, B.BOARD_THUMBNAIL_URL, M.MEM_NO, M.MEM_NICKNAME, M.MEM_PROFILE_PATH, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FAV_BOARD F WHERE F.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO) AS LIKE_COUNT, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FAV_BOARD F WHERE F.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO AND F.MEM_NO = #{memNo}) AS LIKED_BY_CURRENT_USER, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "COMMENT" C WHERE C.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO AND C.COMMENT_STATUS = 0) AS COMMENT_COUNT FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON B.MEM_NO = M.MEM_NO WHERE B.BOARD_STATUS = 0
AND (B.BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%' OR B.BOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%')
ORDER BY B.BOARD_WRITE_DATE ASC
ORDER BY (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FAV_BOARD F WHERE F.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO) DESC
ORDER BY (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "COMMENT" C WHERE C.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO AND C.COMMENT_STATUS = 0) DESC
ORDER BY B.BOARD_READ_COUNT DESC
ORDER BY ( B.BOARD_READ_COUNT + 2 * (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FAV_BOARD F WHERE F.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO) + 2 * (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "COMMENT" C WHERE C.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO AND C.COMMENT_STATUS = 0) ) DESC
ORDER BY B.BOARD_WRITE_DATE DESC
OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{size} ROWS ONLY
FETCH FIRST #{limit} ROWS ONLY
